duck: Tax choice - In public choice theory, tax choice is the idea that individual taxpayers should have a say in how their taxes are spent.
Scroogenomics - Scroogenomics is a non-fiction book written by the economist Joel Waldfogel.
Nudge: Improving Decisions about Health, Wealth, and Happiness is a book written by Richard H. Thaler and Cass R. Sunstein.
Behavioural Insights Team - The Behavioural Insights Team is a team in the Cabinet Office of the UK Government that was set up to apply nudge theory to try to save the government money.

milestones: Hamas leader criticizes Bush's Middle East visit
Bush plans to roll out new Iraq strategy this week
